caption.title: SOC change maps (1990 versus 2100).
caption.p: SOC stock maps (kg C m −2) for 1990 and 2100 as a result of ARPEGE model IPCC scenarios B1, A1B and A2 as well as land use change predictions ( a–d), including absolute ( e–g) and relative difference ( h–j) maps. The maps were generated using ArcGIS 10.1 (ESRI, Redlands, CA, USA: http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis).
